channel.title: Very basic grade calculator [C++]
channel.description:
Hey everyone. I just started learning C++ and made a grade calculator. It's my first program in C++ so please don't flame. It's mainly for teachers. And most likely only very lazy teachers would use it if I were to release it to the public. The grading scale goes as follows: 100% = A+ 99 - 90 = A 89 - 80 = B 79 - 70 = C 69 - 60 = D 60 or lower = F Couldn't remember my school's grading scale, and plus, there's a different grading scale for at least half the classes so I just went with what wikipedia [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Academic_grading_in_the_United_States]said[/url]. I had a feature where it would ask if the student did extra credit, then if he/she did, it would ask how many points, then add it to the amount of points the student already had correct, but I figured the teacher would have already added that in there so I removed the extra credit part. Pictures: [img]http://oi56.tinypic.com/2it6ihh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2ro47sg.png[/img]

item.title: Very basic grade calculator [C++]
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“SETO, post:11, topic:384469”]./GradeCalculator >output.txt[/quote]what if your school needed you to create a program that calculates all of the student’s grades throughout the term and then writes that data to a file so that another program can be used to calculate that student’s overall course grade?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:3, topic:384535"][quote author=r0ckstar96 link=topic=480236.msg3516198#msg3516198 date=1299018811]

I think I died a little bit…

Pros do this in their head.

Well, as you can see, I’m not a pro. I’m no where near that.

Point taken, good job with your first program.

Thanks
And erm… Did you mean pros do the calculations in their head, or already know the code in their head? I can do the calculations, I just felt like seeing if I could turn that into a program
[/quote]

the calculations[/quote]
Ah, okay

Read full topic

item.title: Very basic grade calculator [C++]
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Hey everyone. I just started learning C++ and made a grade calculator. It’s my first program in C++ so please don’t flame. It’s mainly for teachers. And most likely only very lazy teachers would use it if I were to release it to the public.
The grading scale goes as follows:
100% = A+
99 - 90 = A
89 - 80 = B
79 - 70 = C
69 - 60 = D
60 or lower = F
Couldn’t remember my school’s grading scale, and plus, there’s a different grading scale for at least half the classes so I just went with what wikipedia said.
I had a feature where it would ask if the student did extra credit, then if he/she did, it would ask how many points, then add it to the amount of points the student already had correct, but I figured the teacher would have already added that in there so I removed the extra credit part.
